## LinterRule interface

Linter validation rule

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LinterRule 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [description](./core.linterrule.description.md) | string | Detailed description about the rule |
|  [fixable](./core.linterrule.fixable.md) | boolean | True if the rule can try to fix issues, false otherwise |
|  [name](./core.linterrule.name.md) | string | A unique name for the rule |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [exec(context)](./core.linterrule.exec.md) | Validates (and eventually fix) the rule against a package.json file |
